website_summaries.verdict: Large, fashionable mirror is safe and adjustable in all cars.
pros: Made with a premium, matte finish along the boarder of the mirror
Designed to stay securely in place with an easy snap-on attachment
Double strap mounting system ensures that you don't need to readjust the mirror once its set in place
Shatter proof materiel and 100% money back guarantee
cons: This mirror is bulkier and heavier than some others on the list

customer_reviews.title: Hazard! Becomes projectile in car wrecks! Need to return this dangerous item but out of time window
customer_reviews.text: Unsafe. Mirror attached by ball and socket, which is attached to headrest base only by a peg (no screw)! Assumed there was screw in place (holding the peg to headrest base) until recently mirror fell off headrest base unprovoked, hitting my child!!! Immediately, took off mirror and went without. Imagine a car accident with this hazard, which would become a projectile object causing a traumatic brain injury!! While this mirror has a great view of my child like other reviewers have stated, it is so unsafe, which outweighs any good. Do not recommend from a safety aspect. Want to return item for full refund. Mirror is in condition it came in. Seller, please allow this. Waiting on your response.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: A+ product and customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first baby mirror but I’m pretty sure it’s one of the best. Very clear reflection and super easy to install. Also, I appreciated that they reached out to make sure we received our paw mage on time and that we were satisfied. A+ customer service!!! I’ll be purchasing a second one for my husbands car.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Ugwu

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this mirror and let me say I was not disappointed. The first thing I noticed was the clarity of the mirror. I quickly installed it to use right away. The range of view is larger than my original mirror and I added a picture to try to show that. My original baby mirror only showed head and some chest and is magnified. The Lusso mirror definitely gave me a clearer view and I was able to see more of my son. The mirror is attached to the base and pivots but does not move while driving. It also came with a nice cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I went without this with my first daughter. This is a god send for my piece of mind with my second daughter. Even though I can't do much while driving just having that ability to check on her and see how she's doing during the car ride is comforting. This mirror came on time and was packaged nicely. Easy to follow instructions and easy to install. The mirror is huge and nice and clear. Came with a cleaning cloth as well. I just hope it doesn't warp and lasts. Now I just gotta convince my husband to get one for his car.
customer_reviews.author: Missy2beTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW and save your time researching anything else
customer_reviews.text: This mirror ROCKS! I did a lot of research and comparing costs and descriptions, etc. so please let me save EVERYONE ELSE the time and frustration and tell you to just go ahead and buy this mirror. You will NOT be sorry. It is large so you don't need to deal with the drama of centering it and angling it in the exact position to see your kid (many trips runing back and forth from driver seat to child seat = unnecessary pain) AND the image is crystal clear. It's like comparing taking a photo with an old iPad versus a brand new iPhone. Night and day clarity. Enjoy!! We're probably getting another for the inlaws haha
customer_reviews.author: BlakeyNYC

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, high quality mirror! I love being able to check on my baby and I wish I had gotten one sooner! I like how big it is and how clear it is as some mirrors have a weird finish on them. It can rotate to sit vertically or horizontally while strapped down. You can also adjust it very easily to angle the way you need it. It has a nice padded back with buckle straps to hook onto the seat. I would definitely recommend this mirror to any mom!
customer_reviews.author: icecreamlover48

customer_reviews.title: Picture misleading
customer_reviews.text: The ad is misleading. The picture and instructions show a strap going vertical and one going horizontal on the headrest. In reality, the straps are diagonal - like on four corners. So if you have a small headrest, the top two straps always fall down.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Able to see my baby now.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Quality as expected and described. Chose this one over others because it had a matte frame instead of the shiny plastic. Can clearly see my baby in the mirror. Love how big it is and how it is on a pivot. I have a Honda Pilot and the head rests aren't perfectly rectangle (they get narrower towards the top) so it was nice that the straps go both across (left to right) and vertical. Overall, very satisfied. I am glad I bought it. I will recommend this to my many other friends who are currently pregnant. Happy to help out a small company like Lusso.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is great. I love that I can turn around and see my child, or just look in the rear view mirror as well. My rear facing car seat sits in the middle back seat, and I have the mirror installed on the seat next to it since the middle seat does not have a headrest. It works great like this, I can move the mirror to whatever position I need it to be. The mirror quality is great, very clear and easy to see. It was very easy to install and feels very secure. It was easier to tighten than the mirror I had previously purchased at Target. Overall, very versatile mirror, you wont regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vpier

customer_reviews.title: Was a successful gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter-in-law and she said she loves it because she can easily check on my granddaughter. I asked her about it's stability because of the reviews on here about it falling and she said she hasn't had any problems with it so it seems to have been a successful gift. I only rated it 4 stars as I am not the one using it and I don't know how well it will continue to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Stitches

customer_reviews.title: Large and clear !
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. It is large so for some it may interfere with the back view but I like I the large clear view I have of lo. I replaced a different mirror with this one and it is so much clearer and stays in place better than a typical baby brand one i picked up at a local retailer. I gave 4/5 stars because like most mirrors it does move and needs to be repositioned every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is just reflective paint that scratches right off!
customer_reviews.text: Screen is not protected, even when shipped. This item arrived scratched and the mirror is just paint- it scratches right off. I'm not sure if it is toxic but would not trust it w/ a baby.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Great product great company!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car because I watch my granddaughter. I have an off road vehicle which has a rough ride so I liked the stability feature. It really works. The mirror is large and very easy to install and adjust. It’s pretty too!! My 2 daughters threw theirs out and bought this when they saw how great it was. There was a problem with delivery and they reached out to me to rectify the problem before I even knew about it. That’s great customer service. I would highly recommend this company and product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell filled the whole room for weeks
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even put this in my car due to the strong toxic fumes. I opened the box and immediately my husband and I were overcome by a strong smell - smelled very “parfum”-y like the fragrance of a very strong cleaning product right under your nose. I tried off-gassing it in my sunroom for *weeks* and every time I went in there the whole room had an overpowering toxic scent. Wound up returning it because I can’t subject my baby or myself to those chemicals! Going to look for an American made mirror next.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Get a different one-Broke off and hit my baby’s face
customer_reviews.text: Update: I changed my rating from 1 Star to 4 stars because I received a new mirror and some other complimentary items with a hand written note. The new mirror has NOT broken. Thank you for wonderful customer service. Original review: Mirror broke off and fell onto my baby’s face. When it was still attached I could not see her in it... it was too dark.
customer_reviews.author: MamaJennika

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car mirror because of the size. Not only can I actually see my baby from the drivers seat, I can see ALL of her. It was very easy to install....my 8 year old did it. I also like how it can be adjusted by the swivel base instead of having to move the straps around on the head rest. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Useful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and cost efficient option. I have the Britax version and this one and I get a better and clearer view of my toddler with this mirror. I also feel that this one slides less when compared to the Britax due to how the straps are arranged (crossed vs vert and hoz). I’d buy this one again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Camargo

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd mirror and it’s excellent. You spend slightly more than some of the other highly rated ones on Amazon but it’s far superior. It attaches easily and holds very sturdy. Most importantly, the visibility range is very wide- You can see your child at most angles. (I’ve found with the other mirrors, the mirror had to positioned just right in order for you to see them.) I can even see two side-by-side rear facing babies with this one mirror. (One of them sitting in the middle seat of course.)
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFamilyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to see your little one
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I each purchased one of these mirrors for our vehicles. The mirror shows a clear picture of our little one. It is big and our little one is easy to see during the day. The mirror was easy to install. I have it on my center seat and she has it on her side seat. The mirror has a pivet post that allows it to be angled in different directions. The styling of the mirror is nice. I have the tan and she has the black. We are very pleased with the product. Careful not to get distracted looking in rearview at your little one as you drive, the picture is really clear.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin R

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made plastic breaks at the neck - loved it until it broke
customer_reviews.text: Update: this mirror was great For about eight months until it disintegrated. My husband was moving the car seat and bumped it and the neck that holds the mirror in place just snapped. Maybe the material isn’t strong enough for even a light bump? Very disappointing! Original review: It’s impossible to know how we managed before we got this mirror - it allows us to know when baby needs what, to see if her face is in the sun, if she is awake or asleep, needs her chin wiped, is wriggling to use the potty, etc. Absolute necessity if you spend much time driving.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a few months now and am pleased with the purchase. Little one has grabbed it and moved it a few times (when I was putting him in his car seat) but it’s easy to readjust. Great visibility. Nice to look back and see if my little one is sleeping, throwing his shoes, or trying to escape. He loves to admire himself in the mirror when we’re on longer drives. All around sound purchase. Haven’t had it long enough to assess long term durability. Great sized mirror for the price.
customer_reviews.author: FiestyBerry

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as a second mirror for new baby on the way. Tested it out on toddler and now we will be buying two! We hated toddler’s mirror because even though it secured fine we always had to adjust it and it still moved to the point that it was somewhat useless. We needed to jerry rig it to get it to work. THIS mirror is perfect as is. Doesn’t show signs of shifting on its own, love the convex shape as we can see more and it’s super clear. It has a ball and joint base that allows you to position it just right and it clicks in place. If you’re looking around, THIS IS THE ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Emm4

customer_reviews.title: Meets All Needs of A Baby Mirror , Have Had 2 years Now
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is big enough and has a semi-round shape so that if it gets slightly tilted, you can still see your little pretty well. It is very sturdy, my 2 year old got a hold of it and threw it on the concrete prior to my installing and the only damage was scratches to the plastic surrounding the mirror. Might have been just luck, but I would recommend. Has survived being kicked by a toddler and having juice bottles thrown at it for 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: The best baby mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy any other car mirror for your little one. This is the best! We’ve had a few different kinds of backseat monitors, including one that was a video monitor. This mirror is the most economical and it stays where you put it even on bumpy roads. Has a very clear mirror and you can see most of your child. It’s a good size so you aren’t squinting tryin to make out if you’re actually viewing your child. I would recommend this to anyone needing to keep their eye on their little one while driving!
customer_reviews.author: Momma4Life

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this one for baby #1
customer_reviews.text: I am currently pregnant with #2 and cant wait to put this mirror to use with the new baby. I was given a mirror with #1 and I honestly hated it. I had to stuff rags in the back to angle it down so that I could see LO and if we hit a bad bump it would throw everything way off. It was a pain to deal with. I had this mirror on my baby registry with him and didnt get it. As soon as I got the + test and this came up in the Lightning deals I had to buy it! I love how it swivels so I can have it an any angle.
customer_reviews.author: Cewsbaby2120

customer_reviews.title: Happy mama!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this mirror to give to my parents to use in their car when they drive my 4 month old son. However, when it came, I decided to keep it for myself and give them the one I had been using in my car because I loved it so much. It is very large and clear so I am able to easily keep my eye on him while driving. It was also very easy to install which was a huge plus. I'm very happy with my purchase and would absolutely recommend this product to anyone with a child in a rear-facing car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Conway

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic!  (still using it almost 2 years later)
customer_reviews.text: (Edit: this is an edit nearly 2 years later. We still use it. It is still wonderful.) A huge mirror! It does a great job. The mounting is the best I've seen in a backseat kid mirror. The mirror is on a ball socket and it can rotate, so you can use it in portrait or landscape orientations. In my backseat there is not enough room for it to be in standard landscape orientation, so it had to be rotated. It's fisheyed enough that it's super easy to get a full view of my baby in the backseat with no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Emmaly

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mirror for 8 months and was enjoying it. I was just driving and out of nowhere the plastic part holding the mirror snapped in half and the mirror went flying into what would have been the baby’s face if she had been in the car. I will be contacting the manufacturer immediately. This was SO dangerous and scary.
customer_reviews.author: RMA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used if for very long yet, but is "seems" durable and I LOVE the visual from the mirror when I look at it reflecting from my "rear view mirror". It is totally secure since you can mount it "+" - and pull it tight and secure. I had a few "dumb questions" and went direct to the seller and they helped me almost immediately - A++ for the manufacturer's customer service. Highly recommend this to all of you!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy/ CA

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 months then broke
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was great until a few months after I purchased it when I went to put my baby in his car seat and saw that the mirror had broken off the rotating ball part. The return window is closed so I’m stuck throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: stfam

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great view of baby in back seat!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install & great visability. It is a bit convex so baby looks a little bigger so theymre easier to see as well as making it so you can place it on left, right.or middle & see anything/anywhere you need to. My car is not a super smooth ride & I like that the mirror stays put in the angle I place it in, & doesn’t bounce making it hard to see baby. We got 2, one for each of our cars, then we liked it so much went & got a third for my mom’s car for when she is babysitting.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Luxury baby mirror! Every classy Mama should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on those other baby mirrors! I did, and I regret it! This is the best baby mirror on the market that I’ve found! Great quality. Clear mirror image. Holds tight to any headrest. (I have mine in the middle backseat) I don’t like things looking trashy when it comes to baby accessories, and this mirror is really pretty. Not a eye sore at all! Just buy it. I promise you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghers

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It looks and feels like a high quality product. I’m a foster parent so I need products to last the test of time! I see this as my one and only baby mirror purchase. I love how the mirror is large and adjustable without having to adjust the straps. Speaking of the straps, I love that it buckled securely around the headrest so I never have to worry about it falling down mid-drive. This mirror also came with a complimentary cleaning cloth as well as a lovely air freshener. I would definitely love to explore their other baby products!
customer_reviews.author: BC85

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I’ve purchased it many times for friends and once for myself. It’s great quality and provides a good view of my son while he’s in his rear facing car seat. Will definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M Lyons

customer_reviews.title: One of the bestg
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my great grandson and when his little brother was about to be born his mother asked me if I would get her a second one to keep an eye on both that she loved this mirror and didn't want a different brand. She was very excited to receive the second mirror its a nice large size and very well built
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Penny

customer_reviews.title: This is THE car mirror to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best baby purchases we have made, hands down. This is a very high-quality mirror in every respect. It is easy to install, adjust, and importantly is very crisp. Not only do I love being able to easily see my baby while I'm driving, but I love that she can see me and get a much better view of the world around while we are driving. I recently bought this as a gift for my brother and his wife since we've enjoyed our mirrors so much. Still the best back seat mirror on the market!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hartsig

customer_reviews.title: I WENT THROUGH 2 MIRRORS, THE LAST ONE I ...
customer_reviews.text: I WENT THROUGH 2 MIRRORS, THE LAST ONE I BOUGHT AT BABIES ARE US HAD ME PLAYING WITH IT A FEW TIMES A WEEK JUST TO GET THE RIGHT ANGLE... Sorry for the captions, just describing how a totally opposite contrast is with mirror from Lusso Gear. Let me tell you, this is a quality product. Both in clarity of the mirror, the lightness of the mirror, and the most important thing.. The headset strap design. They truly designed this to fit on any headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is huge, which is exactly what I was looking for. It stays in place very well and has a crystal clear image - would never guess it isn't made of glass. Ordered it in black and grey for our cars - the plastic is a matte/velvety material - feels and looks very smooth. It also came with a wiping cloth and a car scent. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TravelLoveHappiness

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for watching your little one in the back seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago and it works great! You do need a car with a removable headrest I think to secure it well. I had a small problem with my first mirror where something came loose so I contacted Lusso Gear and they instantly responded and sent me a new one! Very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Freddy Man

customer_reviews.title: Buy this NOW!!! Outstanding mirror!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding!!! It is rare to find a product that exceeds expectations...this is one that does!!! This is best product I have bought in a long time. Super fast and easy install. It moves up and down and side to side like a TV mount. I can see my son and he can see me PERFECTLY! Buy this right now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loriann828

customer_reviews.title: Good with some notes
customer_reviews.text: Like any mirror this type my main consern this is making sure it is well secure so it doesn’t go flying around car. I have a cheap version on another that has less weight and easier to instal, but this one is harder to secure in place but has better mirror and you can adjust the angle better. So it all depends what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: eks

customer_reviews.title: Look no further if you're shopping backseat mirrors for you child
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this mirror is what really stands out. You can tell it was made with pride and passion and it feels very durable. It mounts very easily to your headrest and the swivel is very heavy duty so you know it will last. The mirror is wide angled so you have a big viewing angle of your little one. If you're shopping backseat mirrors for your child this is one of the best that you will find so I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Girard W. Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This was our first car mirror. We did it right the first time, for sure! I feel great knowing that I can see him clearly while I drive. I don't feel the anxiety of wondering what/how he's doing or not being able to see his smiling, playful face while I drive. We also bought a cheaper one from a big box store for when we travel and rent cars. Big mistake. I wish I had purchased a second one of these instead. Worth the wait and extra bucks for a quality product that works like it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 in a city

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I had bought two others mirrors prior to this one. They were such a pain to adjust on my particular headrest and I had to get a pool noodle so they’d be at the right angle. I saw this come up as a recommendation and I bought it. Best purchase. It was super easy to install and it’s tge perfect angle. I love it. What a relief to find a decent mirror after two failed attempts.
customer_reviews.author: CaitnCam

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was built more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: We love how big this mirror was and it initially worked well, but we would need to adjust it depending on which of us was driving to keep our baby in view. This is not at all a big deal and to be expected with any such product. However, it didn’t last long before the plastic arm broke making the product worthless. I’d happily buy again if it was more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Finally can see
customer_reviews.text: I had a typical carseat mirror but I could never get the right angle with the headrest. I tried countless times and finally gave up. I ordered the Lusso and now I can finally see my little guy. I had it installed and adjusted in less than five minutes. The quality of the mirror seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS MIRROR! Have my baby rear facing car seat in my middle seat. My middle seat doesn’t have a head rest so I was able to secure the mirror to one of the seats by the door that does have a head rest and angle the mirror towards the car seat and it works great!!! I can see my baby perfectly at all times!
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: big backseat mirror
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a big backseat mirror. We love that we're able to adjust it and see our baby from the rearview mirror. Our baby sits behind the driver seat and we have the mirror attached to the middle seat headrest (in a CR-V). Very easy to assemble and setup in your car.
customer_reviews.author: min2be

customer_reviews.title: If you have a rear facing car seat you must have one of these
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product but I was willing to try it anyway and I'm so glad I did. It fits very securely to the seat and the mirror is crystal clear. I can see everything going on in the car seat. In my state we have to keep our little ones in a rear facing car seat until two years of age by law so to be able to see exactly what is going on is a life saver. I'm so grateful for such a wonderful product. Anyone with a rear facing car seat should definitely get one of these!!
customer_reviews.author: D Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Best baby mirror out there
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality baby mirror. Wide view. Easy to install. Stays put. So much better than the baby mirrors that I saw being sold at stores and have purchased before. Would highly recommend. I bought a second one for the second car. I would consider giving to someone for a baby shower gift since you can't get something like this at a store.
customer_reviews.author: jkrug

customer_reviews.title: Deep Scratch On Unprotected Corner of Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: I bought two mirrors and both came with a deep scratch on the corners unprotected by the film. What boggles my mind is why keep one corner unprotected?!?!? While I didn't request for replacements, they shipped me a new one and this time it was scratch-free. I installed this one on my wife's car and she's happier that she no longer sees a scratch. I still have a scratched mirror on my car. I'm sure they would replace it if I requested but I don't care. Increasing my rating to 5 stars because of their outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Olaso

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It is perfect for any adjustable headrest. Me and my wife tried 3 other mirrors that not only we difficult to install ( if not impossible) but small and very unstable. This mirror was incredible simple to install ( less than a minute), has been incredibly stable, and is larger that most commerical products. Not only is all this fantastic but as soon as I placed the order we recieved an email from the co-founder asking if we had any question. Outstanding customer service and a amazing and quality product! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kent barker

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror for your rear facing baby!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best mirrors for rear facing car seats! Don't bother with the ones you buy in the store, they don't stay put, they crack, and I could never get a good view of baby. Til I found these! Amazon baby! These are large and sturdy, they have this cool pivot on the back that stays put when you find the right angle, and they're only around $20.
customer_reviews.author: Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Second one I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my wifes car and it works so well I bought a second one for mine. It is perfect for the first months of your child's life when the carseat must be facing backwards. The view is clear, attaches well, and works as you would hope. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite baby mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to attach to a variety of head rests. Design is about as sleek as you will find for a baby mirror. We have three of these so far between our two vehicles and will probably buy a fourth soon. The color options make them seem right at home in our vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: ACC

customer_reviews.title: Wide area mirror
customer_reviews.text: I drive a sports car .... impossible to sell during covid . I dont have headrests in the back so I have cut a board to attach it to the straps are not enough to keep it stable. I'm sure it works better for a sedan or SUV that has rear head rests.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: This is a REAL MIRROR. Not the bendy, carnival- mirror crap that other companies try to pass of because..they're somehow safer..? ( They're not safer btw:when the crazy-mirrors break, they're still sharp shards of cheap material, don't let them fool you) This mirror secures impeccably to the headrest and you can MOVE and POSITION IT while it's secured. Incredibly user-friendly, big, and clear!
customer_reviews.author: Green Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: Initially we really liked the mirror. Large Mirror size made it great to safely and quickly look in the rear view mirror to check on our child. Loved how easy it was to adjust the mirror to get a perfect angle/view of our little one. We purchased this mirror at the end of June 2019 unfortunately it was broke by the end of November. The arm with the ball end on the back of the mirror broke where it attaches to base.... now we are without a mirror. Disappointed in something that had great reviews didn’t even last half a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: This is the third mirror I've bought for my fourth grandson. The first one broke after a couple of months, the second broke while installing, and this one is doing a great job. Highly recommend!
